title: ANSI Appoints NIST Director as New CEO
snippet: National Institute of Standards and Technology Director Laurie Locascio will step down in early 2025 to serve as the new president and CEO of the American National Standards Institute.

title: NIST director to exit in January - Nextgov/FCW
snippet: Announced by ANSI on October 8, Locascio was elected following a special meeting of the ANSI Board of Directors earlier that week. She will succeed former president Joe Bhatia, and assume office in January 2025.
